subject: {{extras.customer.contact_name}} has completed their eligibility check for finance

rows.text: {{extras.customer.contact_name}} has completed their eligibility check on Kanda.
Once you have finalised their design, you will need to convert their Introduction into a Job to send the order to their tradesperson to confirm.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at howdens@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911.
